titleStmt.title: St. Paul's travailing pangs, with his legal-Galatians, or, A treatise of justification wherein these two dissertions are chiefly evinced viz. 1. That justification is not by the law, but by faith, 2. That yet men are generally prone to seek justification by the law : together with several characters assigned of a legal and evangical spirit : to which is added (by way of appendix) the manner of transferring justification from the law to faith / by Zach. Mayne ...
titleStmt.author: Mayne, Zachary, 1631-1694.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by M.I. for Ioseph Leigh ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.
